name: Final Frontier (jh318)
description:
Made for the SAU Game Development 2017 24 hour game jam.

My first Jam attempt with SDL.

MAKE SURE YOU RUN AS ADMIN ON WINDOWS.

Can you defend Earth from the alien invaders? Is there any hope of survival?

Score to beat is 44.

Controls:

ArrowLeft/Right - Move Left/Right

Space - Shoot ball

R - Restart

Credit:

Project adapted from SDL Udemy course: 

https://www.udemy.com/brick-breaker-game-in-most-powerful-c-graphic-library-sdl2

Very good simple intro to SDL, I recommend it

SFX:
death sound: Ragdoll485
explosion: Mike Koenig
energy bounce: ejfortin

Music:
The Answer by 2L8
http://freemusicarchive.org/music/2L8/The_Answer/2L8_-_The_Answer_-_13_The_Answe...

GitHub: https://github.com/jh318/SpaceJam2017
